name: veeam-data-cloud-services-map
description: Interactive map and API for Veeam Data Cloud service availability across AWS and Azure regions

scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:worker && npm run typecheck && hugo --gc --minify
scripts.dev: npm run build:data && npm run build:worker && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.pretest: npm run build:data && npm run build:worker
scripts.test: npm run test:validate && npm run test:scraper && npm run test:api
scripts.clean: rm -rf public functions/regions.json functions/_worker.js region-discrepancies.json issues-to-create.json
